description: Linen warp & weft with some metallic weft. Open weave. Natural linen warp. Natural Linen & metallic gold weft. Stapled to 8.5x11" card with 99.1.1206.1. "H-4" written on card. Workroom weaving instructions stapled to reverse. (natural, metallic gold)
